newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products all slip with crude.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products all slip with crude.

text.p: NWE oil products were weaker on Monday.
Gasoline edged off earlier levels in line with weaker NYMEX unleaded futures.
High sulphur fuel oil cargo prices slipped after the sale of 25,000 tonnes at $79.50 cif a tonne late on Friday. They nestled around $79/80 with traders anticipating further falls.
Barges rose $2 to $85 in very thin trade. Low sulphur prices firmed to $105 a tonne on slimmer supply
Gas oil stumbled $2 a tonne on weaker futures. Barge premiums were a touch easier, but cargoes steady in thin trade.
